title: Impressions After A Week On The Road
teaser: Here & Now's Jeremy Hobson and Peter O'Dowd are wrapping up their election trip today. They reflect on what has been surprising and memorable about their time on the road.
contentencoded:
Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson and Peter O’Dowd are wrapping up their election trip today. They reflect on what has been surprising and memorable about their time on the road.
